author: bago
msg: Added mailets to handle plain text mails.
WrapText/UnwrapText are used to remove/apply wrapping/flowing (JAMES-532)
OnlyText is used to extract the text plain part of a message (or convert the html part to text only (JAMES-533)
ReplaceContent is used to replace patterns (via regex) in subject or plain text content and being able to specify an output encoding (JAMES-534)
